name: I Love My Job!
description:
Do you enjoy work? Me too!

Welcome to the ultimate office job experience simulation. Sort through files, answer surveys, send emails, and more! Soon you too will be living the life of a 9-to-5 desk jockey.  This marks a new era for video games as labor.

How long can you last at your new job before you are inevitably fired? Find out now!

A game by Sawyer Smith, with invaluable assistance from Spencer Yan

Music used - Music for Airports by Brian Eno
